place.name: BLEBO
place.gazetteerText: Blebo, vil., part of Dura Den vil., Kemback par., Fifeshire, 5½ m. SW. of St Andrews; ½ m. NE. is the seat of Blebo House; 1 m. NE. is the vil. of Blebocraigs. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
